name: Airbnb_Yelp_Overlay
description: Airbnb listings shown on a map with Yelp Listings
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://api.yelp.com/ https://www.airbnb.com/ https://maps.google.com/ https://maps.googleapis.com/ https://maps.gstatic.com/ https://fonts.gstatic.com/; object-src 'self'; style-src 'unsafe-inline' *;
